DINE IN OPTIONS ONLY

GỎI CUỐN - Soft Salad Rolls (2 Rolls) 10.95

Fresh soft rolls with vermicelli rice noodles, lettuce, carrots, beansprouts, cucumber, shrimp, grilled pork, wrapped in rice paper, hoisin based dipping sauce topped with peanut.

Tonkotsu Ramen 23.95

Our tonkotsu broth is gorgeous and complex. It has a lip-smacking creamy soul-warming umami flavour, hearty chewy noodles, and toppings that can include everything from tender fatty pork belly to soft boiled eggs with their golden yolk, nutty-sweet sesame seeds, earthy scallions, 1 bok choy kimchi nori and crunchy bean sprouts.
